Biochemistry.subject: Biochemistry
Biochemistry.question:
Consider the following
Enzymes and protein can be correlated with each other in the following ways
1. All proteins are enzyme.
2. All enzymes are protein.
3. All enzymes are not protein.
4. All proteins are not enzyme.
Which of the above are correct?
Biochemistry.explanation: All enzymes are protein by composition but all proteins are not enzymes.

Human Physiology (Endocrine System).subject: Human Physiology (Endocrine System)
Human Physiology (Endocrine System).question:
Consider the following statements in respect of thyroid gland.
1. It is situated in the neck.
2. It is vital to maintain of normal body temperature.
Which of the statements given above is/are correct?
Human Physiology (Endocrine System).explanation: Thyroid gland is one of the largest endocrine glands which is present in the neck. It is responsible to control bodyâ€™s metabolism, temperature, appetite and muscle strength, etc.
